actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that cost-share payments not used primarily to provide a significant increase in agricultural productivity shall be excluded from gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that cost- sharing payments under specified Federal environmental programs shall be excludable from gross income provided that such payments are not used primarily to provide a significant increase in agricultural productivity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that cost-share payments not used primarily to provide a significant increase in agricultural productivity shall be excluded from gross income.
